name: dog food
msg: Floob enjoyed the meaty flavour of the dog food!
Floob was appalled that you'd even consider offering them this.

name: military-grade Floob food
msg: The MGFF was very filling and enjoyable for the Floob
The food was greasy and reminded Floob of the war...

name: cheese
msg: Cheese :)
Cheese :(

name: Floob
msg: Something just awakened in Floob...
Floob was horrified to see one of their own kind being served as food.

name: baked beans
msg: MMMMMMMMM! BEANZ
Ew, beans.

name: crisps
msg: The crunchy texture was very enjoyable for Floob.
The crisps were to loud and greasy for Floob.

name: caviar
msg: Floob felt like royalty eating the caviar.
Floob didnt vibe well with the fish eggs.

name: meat
msg: Floob chowed down on some nice meat.
Floob is vegan! You're so insensitive!!!

name: energy drink
msg: Floob felt super energized and active after drinking this!
Floob didnt like the flavour of the drink. It gave them a sugar crash.

name: coffee
msg: The coffee gave Floob a nice boost of energy!
The coffee made Floob's stomach hurt.

name: FoodPillâ„¢
msg: The FoodPill has an amazing zany taste, perfect to start your day!
Side effects may include bone pain, loss of hearing and extreme bowel movements.

name: marshmallow
msg: Floob loved the fluffy marshmallow
The marshmallow was too sticky for Floob's liking.

name: fugu
msg: The rush of excitement was very enjoyable for floob.
Floob was paranoid they had a bad part of the pufferfish, so much it prevented them from enjoying it.

name: water
msg: Floob loved the water so much they considered growing gills.
Floob didnt really like the water all to much.

name: pepper
msg: The spicy taste is why this food is very much loved by Floob.
Floob hated how spicy the pepper was.

name: wedding cake
msg: Floob loved the wedding cake's grand design.
Floob thought the wedding cake was just too much.

name: soap
msg: Floob felt clean after eating this.
Floob's having some serious trouble understanding how you got put in charge...

name: sheet music
msg: Floob felt the creativity flowing through their veins.
It felt destructive eating something that took so much effort to make.

name: pi
msg: Wow. a food I enjoy, excellent!
Floob couldn't finish the pi.

name: ramen noodles
msg: Floob loved the ramen noodles for their simplicity.
The noodles were too boring for Floob.
